Partner with PAS and Get Free Access to  Merchantspring 
Partner with PAS and Get Free Access to Merchantspring 

You are here: Home1 / About Us2 / Merchant Spring Partner

What is the AMazon Service Provider Network(SPN)


By partnering with PAS, your brand gains exclusive, complimentary access to MerchantSpring, a powerful tool designed to optimize your Amazon management across multiple countries and marketplaces. Here’s how MerchantSpring can benefit your business:

Key Benefits of Using MerchantSpring with PAS 

On-Demand Data: Access real-time metrics and insights for your Amazon account through single-view, multi-country dashboards, allowing for comprehensive monitoring and analysis.

Automation:Automate routine tasks such as adding negative keywords and monitoring inventory levels, enabling you to focus on strategic decision-making.


Granular Reporting:Obtain detailed performance data, including shipped costs, units sold, and revenue for each ASIN, all customizable to meet your specific reporting needs.

Data-Driven Decisions:Utilize advanced analytics to understand consumer behavior, recognize product trends, identify optimization opportunities, and create data-driven advertising strategies.


Sourcing and Arbitrage Insights:Discover products and niches where Amazon sources inventory from competitors and identify items with the potential to regain lost units.

Predictive Analytics:Avoid business missteps with early warning signals, such as monitoring inventory health, open purchase orders, and vendor lead times to improve supply chain management.

Exclusive Access for PAS  Clients

On-Demand Data: Access real-time metrics and insights for your Amazon account through single-view, multi-country dashboards, allowing for comprehensive monitoring and analysis.

Partner with PAS to leverage the powerful capabilities of MerchantSpring, streamline your Amazon management, and achieve outstanding results in your advertising efforts. Join us today and experience the benefits of advanced analytics and expert support!
